whatâ€™s not working? Are you getting a specific error? 

do you need to put this behind a body/window load listener because the script is starting before the elements are in the domain?

you can use hubl to access hubdb as well as turning your hubdb table into public access which will give you a way to access this data without authentication. 

you can also use graphql

Hello there!

I'm working in the Google Page Speed Insights recomendations for mobile, and one of the oportunities is to "Reduce the unused javascript content", However, the recomendations go throught third party "JS Scripts" such as GTM, per example.

Anyone knows, how i can  working on reduce those scripts?
I never tried it, but on other non HubSpot projects I saw somebody using <https://partytown.builder.io/|partitown> to optimize those 3rd party scripts
Hey! Thanks mate. I'll check it out.
Does anyone know how to embed an instagram carousel in a HubSpot Marketing email?
I was getting an error the the function didn't exist. When I went to look at the files imported on the page, my script was listed, but the content was not loaded.
I got around it by using {% requires_js %} in the module.html file and put the code there.
